channel.title: Berky-Scape [317] Last Edit On:[29/09/2011]
channel.description:
[b]This server is based of a NON Delta also known as a Rune Revival source, 5 years ago released by someone, maybe even longer.
ALL THE CUSTOM ITEMS YOU SEE IN THE SERVER OR SOMETHING ELSE CLIENT-SIDED WILL BE IGNORED BECAUSE I WILL NOT USE THIS CLIENT BUT A DODIAN, PLAIN EMPTY.
I decided to clean this source up and add some new features / fix current bugs etcetera.[/b]
[b]What I've done on the project so far:[/b] - [i]Fixed pickup up items while having a full inventory. (Used to spam text when on item when inventory was full, also kept adding items untill inventory was full)[/i] - [i]Fixed weapon wielding. (Used to send multiple messages when clicked on item)[/i] - [i]Cleaned up the script from useless features. (Never used ones or just very custom features)[/i] - [i]Perfectly logging in and server initializing.[/i] - [i]Fixed the player message sent when the player died it multiple spammed you with about 3 messages saying you've died.[/i] - [i]Level 2 Admins cannot drop items, this has been added to avoid corrupt admins from dropping their items for others to pick up, it removes the item instead.[/i] - [i]Professional Block Animations when wielding shields & unarmed & weapons, everything.[/i]
[b]Currently developing on:[/b] - [i]Better ban features for administrators / moderators.[/i] - [i]Gotta add NPC animations such as death / attack / block.[/i] - [i]Woodcutting fixes when cutting trees. (It currently has some mayor bugs)[/i] - [i]Fix the death animation and item loss upon death.[/i] - [i]Add invalid name scanner, scans player names for invalid names and kicks them if true.[/i]
[b]<< Pictures below >>[/b] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/10nuivm.jpg[/img] [b]Perfectly loggin.[/b]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/ke6zcp.jpg[/img] [b]Perfectly item requirements.[/b]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/wrcoqf.jpg[/img] [b]On player pickup item fully working.[/b]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/20pwzeu.jpg[/img] [b]Perfectly level grant ups. NPC attack animations will be add later, said before above the topic.[/b]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ryhlwz.jpg[/img] [b]Perfectly NPC drops & Bone Burrying.[/b]
[b]Post any suggestions you might have to help me develop this server. P.S: This server will possibly put online when perfectly done on a VPS (24/7).[/b]

item.title: Berky-Scape [317] Last Edit On:[29/09/2011]
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[b]This server is based of a NON Delta also known as a Rune Revival source, 5 years ago released by someone, maybe even longer.

ALL THE CUSTOM ITEMS YOU SEE IN THE SERVER OR SOMETHING ELSE CLIENT-SIDED WILL BE IGNORED BECAUSE I WILL NOT USE THIS CLIENT BUT A DODIAN, PLAIN EMPTY.

I decided to clean this source up and add some new features / fix current bugs etcetera.[/b]

What I’ve done on the project so far:

  • Fixed pickup up items while having a full inventory. (Used to spam text when on item when inventory was full, also kept adding items untill inventory was full)
  • Fixed weapon wielding. (Used to send multiple messages when clicked on item)
  • Cleaned up the script from useless features. (Never used ones or just very custom features)
  • Perfectly logging in and server initializing.
  • Fixed the player message sent when the player died it multiple spammed you with about 3 messages saying you’ve died.
  • Level 2 Admins cannot drop items, this has been added to avoid corrupt admins from dropping their items for others to pick up, it removes the item instead.
  • Professional Block Animations when wielding shields & unarmed & weapons, everything.

Currently developing on:

  • Better ban features for administrators / moderators.
  • Gotta add NPC animations such as death / attack / block.
  • Woodcutting fixes when cutting trees. (It currently has some mayor bugs)
  • Fix the death animation and item loss upon death.
  • Add invalid name scanner, scans player names for invalid names and kicks them if true.

<< Pictures below >>

10nuivm.jpg764×504

Perfectly loggin.

ke6zcp.jpg764×504

Perfectly item requirements.

wrcoqf.jpg764×504

On player pickup item fully working.

20pwzeu.jpg764×504

Perfectly level grant ups. NPC attack animations will be add later, said before above the topic.


Perfectly NPC drops & Bone Burrying.

Post any suggestions you might have to help me develop this server.
P.S: This server will possibly put online when perfectly done on a VPS (24/7).

Read full topic
